src:
Ljubitelji snega tega ne bodo veseli
Čaka nas vremensko pester teden.
03 Nov 2019, 19:14 by P. K.
LJUBLJANA – Med prazniki je ljubitelje zime razveselil sneg, ki je pobelil nekatere dele Slovenije, v prihodnjem tednu pa bo vreme precej jesensko, snežnih padavin ni na vidiku. Ponoči bo oblačno s pogostimi padavinami, ki bodo močnejše v zahodni Sloveniji. V gorah bo lahko tudi zagrmelo. Pihal bo veter južnih smeri, ob morju jugo. Najnižje jutranje temperature bodo od 8 do 14, v alpskih dolinah okoli 6 °C.V ponedeljek dopoldne bodo padavine ponehale, čez dan se bo prehodno delno razjasnilo. Veter bo oslabel. Najvišje dnevne temperature bodo od 10 do 16, na Primorskem do 18 °C. V noči na torek bo na zahodu znova začelo deževati. Padavine se bodo v torek dopoldne širile proti vzhodu. Jugozahodni veter se bo znova okrepil.V sredo bo na vzhodu po večini suho vreme, na zahodu pa bo še nekaj dežja. V četrtek bo spremenljivo do pretežno oblačno, pojavljale se bodo krajevne plohe.
text:
Snow lovers will not be happy about this
We have a colorful week ahead.
03 Nov 2019, 19:14 by P.K.
LJUBLJANA - During the holidays, winter lovers are delighted with snow, which has whitewashed some parts of Slovenia, and in the coming week the weather will be quite autumn, with no snowfall in sight. It will be cloudy at night with frequent rainfall that will be more pronounced in western Slovenia. In the mountains, it can also make a noise. The wind will be blowing from the south, at the south coast. The lowest morning temperatures will be from 8 to 14, in the alpine valleys around 6 ° C. On Monday morning, the precipitation will drop, and during the day the transitional will partly clear. The wind will weaken. The highest daily temperatures will be from 10 to 16, in Primorska to 18 ° C. On Tuesday nights, it will rain again in the west. Rainfall will spread east Tuesday morning. The southwest wind will pick up again. On Wednesday, mostly dry weather will befall in the east, and there will be some rain in the west. On Thursday, it will be mostly cloudy and mostly cloudy.
